name: Feels Like Home Already
description:
1993, Lucasville

You wake up inside a prison. You do not remember how you got there, or why you are. Your goal is to get out of prison, but nobody wants you to get it

  • Confront a crowd of inmates, strong polices, deadly turrets and treacherous mines.
  • Two game modes, one linear where you must escape from jail and another infinite, where you must objetener the maximum score before they finish with you
  • Three totally different weapons, a slight gun, a powerful shotgun and a heavy gatling, each with a special feature
